events.name: Codaisseur Demo Night
events.description: This is the best demo night you have ever seen. It's a-m-a-z-i-n-g. Seriously. Lets make a dent in the universe.

events.name: WWDC: iPhone XXL keynote
events.description: The best iPhone we've build so far. For realz this time.

comments.author: Eric
comments.body: After one look at this planet any visitor from outer space would say “I WANT TO SEE THE MANAGER.”

comments.author: Suzan
comments.body: Some people come into our lives and leave footprints on our hearts, while others come into our lives and make us wanna leave footprints on their face.

comments.author: Billy
comments.body: I'm always relieved when someone is delivering a eulogy and I realise I'm listening to it.

comments.author: Pete
comments.body: A good lawyer knows the law; a clever one takes the judge to lunch.

comments.author: Anne
comments.body: I saw six men kicking and punching the mother-in-law. My neighbor said “Are you going to help?” I said, “No, Six should be enough.”

comments.author: Xander
comments.body: I like to say things twice, say things twice. It can get annoying though, annoying though.
